about_the_game:
The Plague Needle is a customized droppod you're able to use in Awesomenauts. By purchasing the Plague Needle directly from the Steam Store, you can bypass any other requirements that might be necessary for unlocking it with in-game currency.

The Plague Needle is a mutated version of the Gorgos embryo. The embryonic sac that still forms the core of the embryo has evolved into a hypodermal pin on the front of the Needle, allowing a rapid injection of synthetic Skroggle vommit into the targeted. This softens the crashlanding area significantly on impact. Since the substance also reeks like male Skroggle vommit, passengers should be warned that the crash site might attract female Skroggles.
detailed_description:
The Plague Needle is a customized droppod you're able to use in Awesomenauts. By purchasing the Plague Needle directly from the Steam Store, you can bypass any other requirements that might be necessary for unlocking it with in-game currency.

The Plague Needle is a mutated version of the Gorgos embryo. The embryonic sac that still forms the core of the embryo has evolved into a hypodermal pin on the front of the Needle, allowing a rapid injection of synthetic Skroggle vommit into the targeted. This softens the crashlanding area significantly on impact. Since the substance also reeks like male Skroggle vommit, passengers should be warned that the crash site might attract female Skroggles.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection
